caption.center: TOMMY J. TURNER, Appellant, v. ST OF FL, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An Appeal from the Circuit Court for Bay County. Don T. Sirmons, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Tommy Turner, pro se, Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
WOLF, ROBERTS, and WETHERELL, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.Page 699
